title: RIOT PLEASE
body: I sent a email to riot for help because there was a connection error prevents me from log in. The only way for me bypass that was thru a VPN. They not only didn't help me with my connection issue but they've now banned my account... they think I am sharing my aco%%%% with someone else due to different IP log ins, I've already explained its the VPN. And I gave them ennough informations about my account. How ridiculous is this?

replies.body:
They would have asked you a whole bunch of questions to verify account ownership. You don't have to answer all of them but you do most of them, and while the answers don't have to be precise, they do have to be unique.

Any information that isn't visible on the account but is unique to it is helpful to verify ownership. Things like "I bought x skin for x champion when it released" is useful information.
